explains: n. 英国人；大不列颠人

sentences.en: The role is played by seventeen-year-old Briton Jane March.
sentences.cn: 那个角色由17岁的英国人简·马奇扮演。

sentences.en: She did it again one year on at the World Championship in Briton.
sentences.cn: 一年后，在英国举行的世界锦标赛上，她又一次做到了。

sentences.en: The study found the average Briton only knows two jokes.
sentences.cn: 研究发现，每名英国人平均只知道两个笑话。
